data: Now that we who survived have reconstructed a civilization on a rational basis, we want to preserve for future generations as many accounts as possible by the actual witnesses of the catastrophe that overtook the world.
Colladay, Morrison, 1877-; Paul, Frank R. (Frank Rudolph), 1884-1963 [Illustrator]
